sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"comments":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var sOldComments \u003d fd_data._2__for_each.item.comments;\nsOldComments \u003d sOldComments + \u0027\\n\u0027 + \u0027cimanager_demo_flow started for \u0027 + fd_data.subflow_inputs.trigger_name + \u0027 and action id \u0027 + fd_data.subflow_inputs.action_task_id;\n fd_data._2__for_each.item.comments \u003d sOldComments;","savedValue":"cimanager_demo_flow started for {{subflow.trigger_name}} and action id {{subflow.action_task_id}}"}}
